Name: Fear Thy Neighbor
Title: Nail in the Coffin
Desc: In Tamarac, Fla., bad blood between neighbors boils over on Halloween and comes to a horrific end.
LongDescription: In Tamarac, Fla., a new boy becomes friends with the most unruly youngsters in his neighborhood, leading to bad blood that boils over on Halloween and comes to a horrific end.
